items.sentence: The reason that that happened to you was because you weren\'t careful.
Tom said it wasn\'t as difficult to do that as he thought it would be.
I wish I could afford to send my daughter to an Ivy League university.
Tom told me that he wasn\'t at all interested in what Mary had to say.
We\'re going to keep doing this until someone tells us that we can\'t.
Tom got time and a half when he worked beyond his usual quitting time.
Tom has a lot of things to do this morning before he leaves the house.
Tom could tell that Mary didn\'t understand what he was trying to say.
If you want one, you\'ll have to pay for it out of your own allowance.
Is this the first time you\'ve been back to Boston since your divorce?
I assume there\'s somebody somewhere who can do what needs to be done.
I can understand French fairly well, but I\'m not good at speaking it.
Didn\'t you know there used to be a Chinese restaurant on Park Street?
Many of my friends think that Tom and Mary are overprotective parents.
Mary has spent thousands of dollars on beauty products over the years.
Tom wanted to get back home before the kids realized that he had left.
Tom was a better chess player than Mary when they were in high school.
Tom was getting tired of hearing Mary bragging about winning the race.
Tom was going 50 over the speed limit when the police pulled him over.
I was surprised when I found out that Tom used to be a French teacher.
